Need help modeling a Space Capsule that is the shape of the Orion Capsule and the size of the 3.75m parts but has the Windows Of the Ranger from Intersteller. i don't know how how to model a capsule in blender here's what the Windows for the ranger part of it (shown is entire craft Mod version): 

![kfXJC7h.png](http://i.imgur.com/kfXJC7h.png)

Orion:

![TfhR8tC.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/TfhR8tC.jpg)

How much do you know about Blender? Have you been able to make a simple cylindrical fuel tank part and get that into the game?

When getting into add-on authoring, it's always a good idea to start with something easier than a capsule.
No i haven't been able to do that

> 
> No i haven't been able to do that

In that case, I strongly recommend you start with something much simpler, like the aforementioned fuel tank. Familiarize yourself first with the basic Blender and Unity+PartTools workflow, learn how to manipulate meshes and vertices, UV unwrapping, texturing etc, and then, when you've gained enough experience, go back and tackle that capsule project.

Some useful resources to help you get started:

**Modding Resources Compilation:** [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE)

**Simple KSP Fuel Tank Tutorial**: [http://www.alternatewars.com/Games/KSP/Tut1/KSP_Tutorial_1-1.htm](http://www.alternatewars.com/Games/KSP/Tut1/KSP_Tutorial_1-1.htm)

(Note that the CFG writing techniques for this tutorial series may be outdated, approach with caution)
